name: Rarimo
intro: Interoperability protocol for multi-chain assets & identities
introduce: Rarimo is a multi-chain protocol developed to solve the problems of liquidity, access, and interoperability across non-fungible and fungible use-cases. Rarimo makes it easier to work across different chains, allowing you to do things like transfer tokens, stake tokens, and provide proofs of ownership across chains. Rarify Labs is a service provider and community member dedicated to Rarimo.
